title: New Early Warning System Installed in Pio Duran
excerpt: Advanced weather monitoring equipment has been installed to provide better disaster preparedness for our community.
content: The Municipal Government of Pio Duran, in partnership with PAGASA, has successfully installed a state-of-the-art early warning system that will help residents prepare for incoming weather disturbances...
author: Municipal Information Office

title: Community Disaster Preparedness Training Scheduled
excerpt: Free training sessions on disaster preparedness will be conducted in all barangays this month.
content: The Municipal Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Office announces free community training sessions on disaster preparedness and response...
author: MDRRMO

title: Evacuation Routes Updated for 2024
excerpt: New evacuation routes have been established to ensure faster and safer evacuation procedures.
content: Following recent infrastructure improvements, the Municipal Government has updated evacuation routes to provide better access to evacuation centers...
author: Municipal Engineering Office
